ResourceHeader.Description:
High Energy Telescope (HET) ~10-90 MeV/n P, He, and heavier nuclei with same range ~3-10 MeV electrons Large geometry factor high resolution dE/dx and trajectory determining telescope with pha capability optimized for studies of the chemical and isotopic abundances in the cosmic radiation
HET is one of five instruments that make up the COSPIN suite on the Ulysses spacecraft. HET was built, and primary data analysis is maintained, by U. of Chicago, Chicago, IL, USA.

InformationURL.Name: HET Instrument Description
InformationURL.Description: Information about the HET experiment on the Ulysses mission.
